verses.text: Then \w Jonah|strong="H3124"\w* \w prayed|strong="H6419"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* his \w God|strong="H0430"\w* out of the \w fish’s|strong="H1710"\w* \w belly|strong="H4578"\w*,

And \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I \w cried|strong="H7121"\w* by reason of mine \w affliction|strong="H6869"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and he \w heard|strong="H6030"\w* me; out of the \w belly|strong="H0990"\w* of \w hell|strong="H7585"\w* \w cried|strong="H7768"\w* I, \add and\add* thou \w heardest|strong="H8085"\w* my \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*.\f + \fr 2.2 \ft by…: or, out of mine affliction\f*\f + \fr 2.2 \ft hell: or, the grave\f*

For thou hadst \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* me into the \w deep|strong="H4688"\w*, in the \w midst|strong="H3824"\w* of the \w seas|strong="H3220"\w*; and the \w floods|strong="H5104"\w* \w compassed|strong="H5437"\w* me about: all thy \w billows|strong="H4867"\w* and thy \w waves|strong="H1530"\w* passed \w over|strong="H5674"\w* me.\f + \fr 2.3 \ft midst: Heb. heart\f*

Then I \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I am cast \w out|strong="H1644"\w* of thy \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*; yet I will \w look|strong="H5027"\w* \w again|strong="H3254"\w* toward thy \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w temple|strong="H1964"\w*.

The \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* compassed me \w about|strong="H0661"\w*, \add even\add* to the \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*: the \w depth|strong="H8415"\w* closed me round \w about|strong="H5437"\w*, the \w weeds|strong="H5488"\w* were wrapped \w about|strong="H2280"\w* my \w head|strong="H7218"\w*.

I went \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to the \w bottoms|strong="H7095"\w* of the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*; the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* with her \w bars|strong="H1280"\w* \add was\add* about me for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*: yet hast thou brought \w up|strong="H5927"\w* my \w life|strong="H2416"\w* from \w corruption|strong="H7845"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.\f + \fr 2.6 \ft bottoms: Heb. cuttings off\f*\f + \fr 2.6 \ft corruption: or, the pit\f*

When my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w fainted|strong="H5848"\w* within me I \w remembered|strong="H2142"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: and my \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w* came \w in|strong="H0935"\w* unto thee, into thine \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w temple|strong="H1964"\w*.
They that \w observe|strong="H8104"\w* \w lying|strong="H7723"\w* \w vanities|strong="H1892"\w* \w forsake|strong="H5800"\w* their own \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w*.

But I will \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* unto thee with the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of \w thanksgiving|strong="H8426"\w*; I will \w pay|strong="H7999"\w* \add that\add* that I have \w vowed|strong="H5087"\w*. \w Salvation|strong="H3444"\w* \add is\add* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w fish|strong="H1709"\w*, and it vomited \w out|strong="H6958"\w* \w Jonah|strong="H3124"\w* upon the \w dry|strong="H3004"\w* \add land\add*.
